content.rendered:
Responsibilities
1.Creating regular content for the website, blogs, social media, emails, etc.
2.Increasing the conversion of the people viewing our communication by writing compelling headlines, content body, and subjects that would delight the customers
3.Conducting keyword research and using SEO best practices to increase organic traffic
4.Work with Digital Maketers, copywriters in creating marketing strategy and process it.
5.Plan, manage, build, deploy, and analyze campaigns; provide knowledge of best practices and recommendations to the marketing team
6.Ensure high throughput of quality ideas and results
7.Provide best practices and continuously propose test strategies for new campaigns

Who can apply:

Are available for full time
Have relevant skills and interests
Have already graduated or undergraduate
Candidates willing to start their career may also apply
